alert.note: Alert for West Otter Tail; Wilkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Otter Tail and northeastern Wilkin Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 945 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Brushvale, or 9 miles northeast of Wahpeton, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Everdell around 955 PM CDT. Foxhome around 1000 PM CDT. Western around 1015 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Fergus Falls Airport. This includes Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 39 and 60. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
